intro: Astragalus bombycalyx, commonly known as the Chinese milkvetch, is a flowering plant native to China and parts of Central Asia. It is a member of the legume family, Fabaceae, and is characterized by its compound leaves and small, yellowish flowers. The plant produces pods that contain several seeds, and it is often found in dry, rocky habitats. Astragalus bombycalyx is known for its medicinal properties and is used in traditional Chinese medicine.
